document_data.name: Vilnask
document_data.mainbody: '''Vilnask''' was a small mining town and a caravan stop on the [[High Road]] on the [[Sword Coast North]]  in the mid–14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Geography: Vilnask stood between the city of [[Neverwinter]] and [[Leilon]] along the High Road.
document_data.Trade: The town made business by mining raw [[silver]], [[iron]], and [[mithral]] as well as providing smithing services. Additionally, like other small towns, Vilnask also had an [[inn]], jeweler, and an arms shop.
document_data.History:
Founded in the early 14{{th}} century [[DR]], after a great supply of valuable ores were discovered in a cave south of Neverwinter by an adventurer for whom the town was named after. Following the discovery, for the next several winters, miners, smiths, and merchants from nearby regions came to settle in Vilnask where these precious metals were found.

By the mid–14{{th}} century [[DR]], Vilnask was known for the fine metal goods it produced.
document_data.Inhabitants: *[[Willo Clovyr]] was said to be one of the greatest smiths of the [[Savage Frontier]], having produced weapons known far and wide for their strength and balance.
